package.name: Services_Weather
package.summary: This class acts as an interface to various online weather-services.
package.description: Services_Weather searches for given locations and retrieves current weather data and, dependent on the used service, also forecasts. Up to now, GlobalWeather from CapeScience, a XML service from weather.com and METAR from noaa.gov are supported. Further services will get included, if they become available, have a usable API and are properly documented.
